data.title: Insightful
data.name: Ryan Alberts
data.content: "Cristine is insightful and skilled in so many aspects - establishing a UX vision, wire-framing, theme setting, generating feedback, writing the code - you name it! "

data.title: Innovative
data.name: Bruce Clark
data.content: "She approaches every task with care and brings unique solutions to the table. Because her skillset crosses design and engineering she's a great hybrid on a front-end team."

data.title: Integrity
data.name: Julia Moravcisk
data.content: "Her ability to translate my wireframes into a finished product have made her an absolute pleasure to work with. She has always shown the utmost integrity and professionalism."
